<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_713641_request_m_service_request_table_pw</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="x_713641_request_m_service_request_table_pw">due_dateISNOTEMPTY^EQ<item endquery="false" field="due_date" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>expiration try</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
 var data = new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue();
//	var gdt= gs.nowDateTime(); //u_closed_at is the name of the custom Date field
	if(current.due_date == data ){
current.state = 3;
		current.update();
}
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-12-20 16:09:49</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>48aa256d4760c110e3d98a5f746d43fb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>expiration try</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Request Management PW" source="x_713641_request_m">dfa02e7f47900110e3d98a5f746d43f5</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Request Management PW">dfa02e7f47900110e3d98a5f746d43f5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_48aa256d4760c110e3d98a5f746d43fb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-12-20 16:35:08</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=48aa256d4760c110e3d98a5f746d43fb"/></record_update>
